subject: Alcoholic Beverages
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johnny Macchione, the Chicago Cubs fan who tossed beer on Philadelphia Phillies outfielder Shane Victorino, apologized and said he hoped his fellow fans would forgive him.
snippet: Johnny Macchione, the Chicago Cubs fan who tossed beer on Philadelphia Phillies outfielder Shane Victorino, apologized and said he hoped his fellow fans would forgive him.
